remarks: Value of the ordinal injection function.  (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 18-Jan-2015.)
statement:
dnnumch.f $e |- F = recs ( ( z e. _V |-> ( G ` ( A \ ran z ) ) ) ) $.
dnnumch.a $e |- ( ph -> A e. V ) $.
dnnumch.g $e |- ( ph -> A. y e. ~P A ( y =/= (/) -> ( G ` y ) e. y ) ) $.
dnnumch3lem $p |- ( ( ph /\ w e. A ) -> ( ( x e. A |-> |^| ( `' F " { x } ) ) ` w ) = |^| ( `' F " { w } ) ) $.
$d A w x y z $.
$d F w x y $.
$d G w x y z $.
$d ph w x $.
